description: Smoker creates thick smoke that traps and immobilizes multiple opponents simultaneously. The smoke is dense enough to completely engulf and restrain entire groups of enemies.

keyUsages.outcome: Successfully captured all of them at once
keyUsages.significance: First demonstration of this technique, showcasing Smoker's ability to handle multiple pirate crews simultaneously

strengths: Can trap multiple opponents at once
Difficult to escape from without special abilities
weaknesses: Can potentially be dispersed by strong winds

description: Smoker turns his arm (except his fist) into smoke and launches his fist at the opponent as a long-range punch. The smoke arm extends the range significantly.

keyUsages.outcome: Successfully hit Luffy with overwhelming force
keyUsages.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's offensive capabilities and long-range attack options

strengths: Difficult for non-Haki users to defend against

description: Luffy stretches his arms to grab a distant object and then releases, propelling himself forward at high speed. Can carry others with him.

keyUsages.outcome: Successfully boarded the ship with Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp in one motion
keyUsages.significance: Demonstrates the technique's versatility for quick escapes and group transport

weaknesses: Requires a fixed point to grab onto
